Show / Hide Table of Contents

Namespace PacManBot.Commands

Classes

ExampleUsageAttribute

Provides example usage of a command. The string "{prefix}" refers to the guild prefix.

HideHelpAttribute

When present, indicates that this command should not be visible when listing commands to the user.

ModuleBuilder<TModule, TContext>

Allows you to create a new instance of a module. Only ever useful/justifiable in an evaluated script for testing. The class stores reflection data about a module type after the first use and uses it in the future.

ParametersAttribute

Overrides the automatic parameters displayed for this command.

PmBaseModule

The base for Pac-Man Bot modules, containing their main services and some utilities.

PmBasePermissionAttribute

The original permission preconditions from Discord.Net had a wrong value for DM permissions, and didn't list all missing permissions in the error message. I hope to delete this one day.

PmRequireBotPermissionAttribute

Indicates this command can't run unless the bot has the specified permissions.

PmRequireUserPermissionAttribute

Indicates this command can't run unless the user calling it has the specified permissions.

RequireDeveloperAttribute

Allows either the application owner or any specified developers in the configuration file to run a command.
